title: Bloomberg Markets: Haveford's Smith Sees `Win-Win' for Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Haveford's Smith Sees `Win-Win' for Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hank Smith Chief Investment Officer Haverford Trust Discussing why the macro environment sets up as a win-win for the equity markets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
